channel.title: portal engine error
channel.description: steam updated recently, playing portal just now and objects like turrets and barrels half way through the floorand acting like they were in water when i threw them. then the entire program closed, NO FREE EDICS or something like that.

item.title: portal engine error

item.description:
all fixed, sorry for the late reply just not used to using forums.
thanks again

item.title: portal engine error
item.dc:creator: borealis117
item.description:
Brother Shrike:

Right click on the game in steam, click properties, the disk tab, try defragging and verifying content. Then try redownloading.


thankyou Brother Shrike, btw love your avatar I laughed out loud the first time i saw it.

Read full topic
